data.message: @Danny If you want to quickly clear everything you've ever posted and sent, just delete your account and create a new one :-) I don't think a social networking community would be very useful if it didn't record what you post. I do agree chat history is a little different so they probably should add that feature back in. Also, how does facebook know all the options that _you_ want. The only way you are going to have a social community that does everything you want is to create your own site. It has been done before ...
